concepts.definition: A state of well-being in which an individual realizes their abilities, can cope with normal life stresses, work productively, and contribute to their community.
concepts.importance: Mental health is fundamental to our collective and individual ability to think, express emotions, interact with each other, earn a living, and enjoy life.

concepts.definition: A feeling of worry, nervousness, or unease about something with an uncertain outcome.
A mood disorder causing a persistent feeling of sadness and loss of interest.
The body's reaction to harmful situations, whether real or perceived.
